sentences.sentence: The United States has said it will begin to train Ukrainian pilots how to fly F-16 fighter jets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: On Thursday, the Pentagon said they'd begin with English language lessons in September and provide in-flight training in October.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The move comes as Denmark and Netherlands announced they'd send F-16s to Ukraine after Washington gave the go-ahead to send third-party fighter jets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And video footage appears to show special forces raising the Ukrainian flag in Russian-annexed Crimea following special joint operations in the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: When Spain's Football Federation called an emergency meeting, the country's media assumed the organization's president would draw a line under the Kissgate scandal by falling on his sword.

His refusal to resign was condemned by Spain's higher council for sport.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: What is prohibited offline must be prohibited online. That's the general thrust of the EU's biggest ever shake-up of online regulation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Digital Services Act came into force on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It's aimed at keeping users safe online and stopping the spread of hate speech or harmful content that's either illegal or violates a platform's terms of service, such as the promotion of genocide or anorexia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Social networks, search engines and marketplaces like Amazon and Google will have to comply or face hefty fines, and users will have more control.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So specifically, users will now have more transparency on how content moderation decisions are made.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Users will have more choice regarding the content that they engage in.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So, for example, they can opt out of personalised advertising or they can determine that the content that they see is presented in a chronological order rather than based on determinations of the recommender systems that are based on vast amounts of data collection.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: There will be more mechanisms for complaints and mechanisms for address for individual users.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: For the time being, only the 19 largest companies, those with more than 45 million monthly users, are affected. The others have until February to comply.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Not all of them are happy and some are pushing back.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: But for now, they'll have to play ball.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Some digital giants have already announced the measures they're putting in place to adapt to the new environment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Let's talk about the users.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So, for example, we have seen several platforms coming forward in the last few days to outline some of the measures that they will be adopting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This includes Meta, for example, Google and Snapchat, and TikTok in particular has also outlined some of the measures that they will be adopting, including how they will increase their transparency and their accountability for users in the European Union and, of course, how this will impact users more globally as well.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Interestingly, however, TikTok and the company formerly known as Twitter underwent stress tests earlier this summer, in which the European Commission noted that much more work was actually needed in order for both platforms to be compliant with the law. Certain targeted advertisements particularly those aimed at minors are now prohibited as are those based on sensitive data such as sexual orientation or religion. In the event of infringement companies face big fines but Brussels insiders have pointed out some notable emissions, like eBay, Airbnb, Netflix and even Pornhub.

But he still remains the leading candidate for the 2024 Republican presidential nomination. Japan's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant

sentences.sentence: has begun its second day of its controversial release of purified water into the sea.

The main opposition party in South Korea called for a halt to the operation, with many of its members taking to the streets in protest. According to Japanese authorities, the reservoirs have to be emptied to decommission the plant, which suffered a serious accident due to an earthquake and tsunami in 2011.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Emperor penguins depend on stable sea ice to raise chicks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But as seen here, sea ice in Antarctica eroded by record levels in 2022, causing young penguins to fall into freezing water and ultimately killing all of the chicks that lived in this area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: That's according to research released by the British Antarctica Survey. Experts noticed sea ice levels in 2022 completely disappeared.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The key finding is that emperor penguins nest on sea ice and they need that substrate to last beyond December in order to support their breeding season successfully. So if it breaks up earlier than early December the chicks will actually fall into the sea and they will drown. If they manage to scramble out of the sea their plumage will be wetted and they'll die of hypothermia. Alternatively they may be able to stay on ice flows but they drift away and then the parents can't find them and they all starve to death.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: While it's possible for the population to recover from one or two bad breeding years, there is worry about the penguins' future.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: According to the World Wildlife Fund, around 80% of emperor penguin colonies are expected to be quasi-extinct by the end of the century because of climate change.
